com.atmecs.falcon.automation.db.sql

Interface SQLDataAccessService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDataAccessServiceImpl

    public interface SQLDataAccessService
    SQLDAOService Interface provides various services that have common SEQUEL Queries to perform basic CRUD Operations.
    Author:
    nv092106

      • selectListOfRows

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> selectListOfRows(java.lang.String selectQuery)
        Purpose: With SELECT command, gets list of Rows. Each row will be in the form of Map with column name as Key
        Parameters:
        selectQuery - is the SQL SELECT Statement
        Returns:
        Result is returned as a List of table rows where each row mapped to Map object with column name as key and result as value

      • selectSingleRow

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> selectSingleRow(java.lang.String slectQuery)
        Purpose: With SELECT command, expects a single row as output
        Parameters:
        slectQuery - is SELECT Statement
        Returns:
        Result is returned as Map object with column name as key and result as value

        Updates the affected records of a Table
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        setColumnName - is the column name where User wants to update with new value
        setColumnValue - is the value of String type where User wants to update with given column name.
        whereColumnName - is the column name to specify with where condition
        whereColumnValue - is the value of String type to
